start.text: Captain, Riri has arrived in the battlefield
Captain, memeber to call me Kasuta, don't use Riri in public.
Kasuta has taken over the battle field.

retreat.text: Captain, Riri has completed her work, the rest is up to you

out_of_missiles.text: Em, the missile ran out within the timeline Riri perdicted
Captain, Riri has ran out of missiles. How is the Captain doing?

engaged.text: Riri is here to ensure the Captain finish the job
Captain, Riri suggest you finish this quickly
Time is preasure, please use the most efficient way to complete the battle, Captain

need_help.text: Captain, working with Riri is the most efficient method right now
Riri really need the Captain's support

pursuing.text: Now is the perfect chance to attack
Attack now will have double the effect for half the effort
Attack! Riri will not fail the captain!

running.text: Retreating now is the only way to prevent maximized loss
Captain, Riri is retreating, please be careful

hull_90.text: Recieved slight damage, this will not reduce work efficiency
Riri is fine, don't worry, captain

hull_30.text: The situation may be out of Riri's control
Riri, in the name of Kasuta......

overload.text: Ship overloaded, this will severely impact efficiency. Must try my best to avoid it

death.text: Thank you for your care, captain......but all of these are what I should be doing......no need to do this, captain......
Riri......？Please don't call me that, if possible, just call me ‘Kasuta’......

victory.text: Everyone have a different method of thinking, I hope I can understand the captain more in the days to follow.
Even though I am not used to smile all the time, I will try my best to find an opportunity to let myself smile.
